name: PokeGraphQL
description: All the Pokémon data you'll ever need in one place, easily accessible through a modern GraphQL API.

ASPNETCORE_FORWARDEDHEADERS_ENABLED.description: Turns the forward-header-middleware on. Needed to forward the scheme for Linux and non-IIS reverse proxies.

ASPNETCORE_HSTS_ENABLED.description: Turns the HSTS-middleware on. The middleware options are set to the minimal requirements described in https://hstspreload.org/
